original_title: Sri Lanka bonds close down, rupee 322.00/324.00 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds closed down, dealers said while the spot US dollar closed at 322.00/324.00 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed down at 15.10/30 percent after opening at 15.25/35 percent on Monday.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2028 was closed steady at 15.25/40 percent after opening at 15.25/35 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was closed down at 13.25/45 percent after opening at 13.80/14.20 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 and 01.07.2025 have not been quoted. (Colombo/July14/2023)
